spec_data.Name: python2-cram
spec_data.Description:
Cram tests look like snippets of interactive shell sessions. Cram runs each
command and compares the command output in the test with the command's actual
output.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:24:34 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple testing framework for command line applications
